location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Map of flying boat facilities at Manama, Bahrain

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: ink on paperDimensions: 330 x 220 mmFoliation: The map has a folio number (124) on the front in its top-right corner. The number is enclosed by a circle.

mods.abstract: The map shows the north east area of the Bahrain islands, focusing on the waters between Manama town and Muharraq Island. The coastlines are drawn as black line, with key flying boat base features (moorings, alighting area, pier, proposed site for passenger shelter) indicated in red ink.
